short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button that will play the inception sound.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This provides a button that allows you to make the inception sound.

The sound clip is considered fair us under Title 17 of the United States Code, Chapter 1, ยง 107A (3) and (4)
